title: Discordant Lovesickness

description:
Description :
        Volume 1: Discordant Lovesickness (Shounen Ai)
Two childhood friends grow apart as the grow up. 
Their hobbies and their opinions diverge from one-another which leads to vexation.
Yet, this is only the blossoming beginning of their romance.

Volume 2: Discordant Lovesickness ~First Time~ (Yaoi)
Through trial and tribulation the two childhood friends end up dating.
This is the story of their first time together.
